pages.text: The maid grid is a block designed for automation that needs to be placed close to a block that can store items, such as a chest. $(br2)It also can be placed close to a workbench to enable craft.

You can mark the item by right-click on the grid and you can mark up to 9 items, right-click with an empty hand can remove the mark. $(br2)Right-click on the four corners of the grid to switch between input and output modes, right-click on the four sides of the grid to switch between whitelist and blacklist mode.

When the grid is placed close to the container such as the chest, set mark item, input or output, whitelist or blacklist, the surrounding maids can store or take out the corresponding items from the chest.

When the grid is placed close to the workbench, the item mark (input, output, whitelist, blacklist settings are invalid) should be marked according to the recipes at this time, so that the surrounding maid can craft item according to the mark.$(br2)The grid is destroyed can retain its content, and empty hand shift right-click grid can clear all item marks.
